channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Previously repaired drain cover now sunk again, 23rd February
item.description:
Repairs to this drain cover have failed again. Very politely suggest some steel reinforcement or a plate in the repair to spread the weight of the vehicles passing over.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Very slow draining, 22nd February
item.description:
The drain outside 15 Clarence Square is very slow to clear. The shower today was quite sharp, but this picture was taken 30 minutes after it stopped. I didn't get a chance to check the other drains, but the one outside 8 is also prone to blocking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Misaligned randabout with kerb stone, 22nd February
item.description:
The kerbstone sticks out into the road as you come off the roundabout at the wrong angle when coming from the SW and heading to leckhampton. Kerb needs to be brought back by approx 2ft to ease traffic flow
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Junction, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Ramp onto leckhampton road, 22nd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Junction, Coberley, Cotswold

item.description:
Just before church gate
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Sevenhampton, Cotswold

item.title: Badly designed carriage joining, 22nd February
item.description:
The residents express dissatisfaction with this design as it lacks "flares" the edges are 90 degrees and need to be rounded so they can safely exit. Looking at the image you will see cars have to drive into the far lane to get clearance to turn. Should people exiting cut the corner there is a risk to pedestrians. This is poorly designed. When residents raised it with workers, the workers knew it was bad design and built it anyway. Willis said it would be fixed but never bothered and the council accepted it with out looking at the obvious issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Patched 20 times, 22nd February
item.description:
This as you can tell has been patched 20 times at this stage needs resurfacing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 114, Cleevelands Avenue, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: 20 patch repairs already, 22nd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Cleevelands Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Uneven slab outside The Rotunda caused head injury and item damage, 22nd February
item.description:
On the pavement outside The Rotunda opposite Montpellier Gardens. The slab is significantly uneven and caused someone to fall and hit their head, as well as irrepairably breaking their glasses and watch. They sustained a head injury which could've been grievous. We were visiting Cheltenham for the first time so we are unsure how long this issue has been present, but it happened immediately upon arrival after getting off a bus at the stop nearby and caused distress for the rest of the day, cutting our trip short. We have photographic evidence of the injuries and damages sustained.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dips in path needs filling and levelling., 22nd February
item.description:
